Parent Derivation

You can generate samples for testing here.

  1. Click GENERATE
  2. Copy the BIP32 Extended Public Key
  3. Paste it into Parent xpub
  4. Copy one of the Private Keys
  5. Paste it into Child Private Key
  6. For the derivation path, convert it to a path from the External part.
    • m/44'/0'/0'/0/2 becomes m/2

This currently only supports generating the private key one level up.
